title: Meta is killing this game.
body:
Hi guys.
I'm not going to place there any introduction. You can't deny that your game prosper really bad. Do you know why? You make champions, which are unable to outplay like Zoe. Playing against her is so 
frustrating and another thing is that she can be even behind, but still enable to one shot someone.
Next thing: There is no joy of playing assasin. For example Zed. You guys have added so much form of cc that kills assasins. I can't go in with Zed to just kill adc- I will get Camille R on my face, 234342 CC from Rakan and i won't be able to cast my R to go back to my shadow.
Another thing: Lee Sin was a symbol of your game and You removed warding item. I know that you can buff him enough to increase his win rate, but many mechanical players won't have occasion to try in-sec and other 
spectacular plays.

And, in my opinion, it's impossible to carry game alone, when you get 3213 CC, 2000 dmg combo from 0-5 Zoe. In past I played League, because i knew that if i was enough good, I would reach high division. When i was losing i knew that i should have played better. Actually I feel like I play faultlessly, but despite that everything depends on my team.
I realize that It's a team game, but helplessness is too perceptible. Do you know, why HotS isn't popular? Because your impact on game is really small. It's starting to look the same in League. 

What can you do? Increase snowball effect, "nerf cc", stop releasing champions which are difficult to understand (Le'Blanc rework[Her new R XDD]).
Stop killing this game.
JPDG

Most of the reworked tanks have disgusting amounts of CC too. Take Zac for instance. He can jump on you from over 1000 range then CC you for years and you can't even reduce it by tenacity because they're all knockups.

Everything on his kit is telegraphed and can be dodged fairly easily

Ornn's interesting... The things he scales with are mana and cdr. Once an Ornn gets enough mana and CDR to just continually spam his abilities he can permalock someone or go on a long, albeit slow, chase with you trying to kill him only for him to slowly whittle you down as he keeps ccing you and running away.

Orrn doesnt scale with anything Or he doesnt scale with anything enough which is his original problem when he had Current hp damage on his W You could stomp lane with Orrn if you played well early  and as soon as 7 mins came you lost because your items wont keep you in control of your lane. becuase Q scales with ad W doesnt scale E scales with armor and magic resist (poorly) and ult is long cooldown and scales (poorly )with ap
Thats my point really. He doesn't scale with anything well except being able to use his abilities more and more often.

Except Zac does roughly the same amount of CC as before. Yes, if you and an ally get hit by a near max range Q then it increases significantly, but Zac ult is much worse than before until level 11 because the charge up time is unreliable to get off unless someone else CC's who you want to scoop or you land the Q which yet again is not the easiest thing in the world since its a wind up linear skillshot with a condition of having someone else in range to auto attack.
